=== What ===

Party like a bunch of wild Jackalopes! B)

More on <nowiki>[[FloridaTeam-ReleasePartyPlanning|Planning a Release Party]]</nowiki>.

=== Who ===

Everyone is invited.  This means families if so inclined. 

LoCo Contacts are expected to organize the location and time.  They will also need to get the information to <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:reya276]]</nowiki> so that he can finalize the flyer design and we can get them printed.
